item.title: Implementing Entity Framework Core 6 With ASP.NET Core 6
item.description: Introduction Entity Framework (EF) Core 6, coupled with ASP.NET Core 6, brings robust data access capabilities to the table, making it a preferred choice for building scalable and modular applications. In this blog post, we will explore the integration of EF Core 6 into an e-commerce system using .NET Core services and APIs. What is EF Core 6 in ASP.NET Core 6? Entity Framework Core 6 is an Object-Relational Mapping (ORM) framework that simplifies database access in .
